sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'
  import { MDXTag } from '@mdx-js/tag'
  

export default class MDXContent extends React.Component {
  constructor(props) {
    super(props)
    this.layout = null
  }
  render() {
    const { components, ...props } = this.props

    return <MDXTag
             name="wrapper"
             
             components={components}><MDXTag name="h1" components={components} props={{"id":"udemy-eth-course"}}>{`Udemy ETH Course`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"short-history"}}>{`Short History`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="ul" components={components}>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`Oct 31, 2008: BTC White paper describing system that could pay each other directly without need of central authority.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`Dec, 2013:
- ETH White paper for need for more programmatic control over transactions
- Wanted to enabled creation of decentralized austonomous corporations (DAC)
- Introduces the idea of "Smart Contracts" as an entity that can send and recieve currency, beyond just humans
- The "Smart Contract" lives within the Ethereum blockchain`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h3" components={components} props={{"id":"so-what-is-eth"}}>{`So what is ETH?`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}><MDXTag name="strong" components={components} parentName="p">{`Primitive description:`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="ul" components={components}>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`ETH networks are used to transfer money and store data`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`Different ETH networks`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`Networks are formed by one or more nodes`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`Each node is a machine running an ETH client`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`Anyone can run a node`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`Each node can contain a full copy of the blockchain`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`You can also create your own private ETH network for testing etc. There is not just one network; there are many.`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"interfacing-with-eth-networks"}}>{`Interfacing with ETH networks`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`Some of the common ways:`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}><MDXTag name="strong" components={components} parentName="p">{`Dev Tech:`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="ul" components={components}>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`web3.js (our "portal" to the ETH network)`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}><MDXTag name="strong" components={components} parentName="p">{`Consumers:`}</MDXTag></MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="ul" components={components}>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`Metamask (Chrome extension to interact)`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`Mist Browser (Full feature web browser)`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h3" components={components} props={{"id":"metamask-extension"}}>{`Metamask Extension`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="ul" components={components}>
<MDXTag name="li" components={components} parentName="ul">{`Test contracts will be done on Rinkeby Test Network`}</MDXTag>
</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="h2" components={components} props={{"id":"eth-accounts"}}>{`ETH Accounts`}</MDXTag>
<MDXTag name="p" components={components}>{`Metamask creates an account address, public key and private key.`}</MDXTag>
           </MDXTag>
  }
}
